mapper.select: select member.m_id, member.id, member.nickname, AVG(review.score) score from member left join review on member.m_id = review.m_id where member.m_id=#{mId} group by m_id
select member.m_id, member.id, member.nickname, AVG(review.score) score from member left join review on member.m_id = review.m_id where member.id=#{id} group by m_id

select member.m_id, member.id, member.nickname, AVG(review.score) score from member left join review on member.m_id = review.m_id where member.m_id=(select m_id from member_has_party where is_writer=true and p_id=#{pid}) group by m_id
